What is Picross?

Picross is a grid-based logic puzzle game where the goal is to fill in all of the correct tiles on the grid to reveal a hidden image. To find the correct tiles, use the numbers along the top and side of the grid. The numbers near the grid follow basic rules:

  • An empty space, number, or set of numbers in a line are positioned next to every vertical and horizontal line in the grid and act as clues for that specific line.
  • The numbers along the top of the grid serve as clues for the vertical lines and the numbers along the side of the grid serve as clues for the horizontal lines.
  • If the space next to a line in the grid has no numbers, that indicates that there are no correct tiles (ie. tiles that need to be filled) in that line.
  • How many numbers there are next to a line of the grid indicates how many line segments there are in that line.
  • A line segment is a linear connected group of correct tiles that is seperated from other groups of correct tiles by at least one or more incorrect tiles.
  • A number indicates the number of correct tiles in a segment.
  • The order that the numbers of a set appear in indicate the order in which each segment will appear with the first segmement appearing away from the grid and the last segment appearing on the edge of the grid.

Basic Strategy

Unlike traditional Picross, this version has a limited amount of incorrect answers in the form of lives. Once you run out of lives it's game over and you'll have to start over. To avoid a game over, one basic strategy to solve a puzzle is to cross off or place an 'x' on incorrect tiles to help make finding correct tiles easier. Thinking logically and deducing which tiles need to be crossed off and which need to be filled in is the core of gameplay. If you want to start a new puzzle, press the next button located below the pause button. Take your time and have fun! If you're short on time try clicking the heart, you may get a little surprise!

Controls

  • Click sqaure to fill clicked tile.
  • Click x to cross out clicked tile click again with x to remove it from the tile.
  • Press any key to quick toggle fill mode.
  • Click the forward button under the pause button to load new puzzle.
  • Click the secret button for a special surprise!
  • Click the i button to reopen these instructions.
